text: The New Alliance () was a political alliance in Benin. ==History== The Alliance was formed prior to the 2003 elections as an alliance of the Democratic Party of Benin and the Union for Progress and Democracy.Bogdan Szajkowski (2005) Political Parties of the World, John Harper Publishing, p66 Part of the opposition coalition, the Alliance won two seats. ==References== Category:Defunct political party alliances in Benin
title: New Alliance (Benin)
